segments.text: It's a lovely day , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the weather sure is nice today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love it when the weather is like this.Why don't we sit down outside and have our lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like a good idea.The sky is clear , the sun is shining and there's a nice cool breeze , so it is not too hot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really miss the change of seasons like we have in Colorado.but I must admit , this sure is a nice spring day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , this spot in the shade looks really comfortable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay.Hey , is that a dark cloud over there ? Do you think it will rain after all ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . I say the weather report last night , and it said the weather should be fine all day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If the weather stays nice perhaps we can go to the beach this weekend.It ' s been a while since I've not really gotten some sun .
segments.speaker: S1
